org.cef.handler

Class CefWindowHandlerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cef.handler.CefWindowHandlerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CefWindowHandler 

    public abstract class CefWindowHandlerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements CefWindowHandler
    An abstract adapter class for receiving windowed render events. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as convenience for creating handler objects.(用于接收窗口渲染事件的抽象适配器类。此类中的方法为空。此类的存在是为了方便创建处理程序对象。)

    • Constructor Summary

      CefWindowHandlerAdapter()

      Retrieve the view rectangle.(检索矩形视图。)
      void onMouseEvent(CefBrowser browser, int event, int screenX, int screenY, int modifier, int button)
      Implement this method to handle mouse events on Windows.(在Windows上实现此方法来处理鼠标事件。)

      • onMouseEvent

        public void onMouseEvent(CefBrowser browser,
                         int event,
                         int screenX,
                         int screenY,
                         int modifier,
                         int button)
        Description copied from interface: CefWindowHandler
        Implement this method to handle mouse events on Windows. The method is called in case of the following events: MOUSE_MOVED, MOUSE_PRESSED, MOUSE_RELEASED and MOUSE_WHEEL for a horizontal wheel movement.(在Windows上实现此方法来处理鼠标事件。在发生以下事件时调用该方法：MOUSE_MOVED、MOUSE_PRESSED、MOUSE_RELEASED和MOUSE_WHEEL。)
        Specified by:
        onMouseEvent in interface CefWindowHandler
        Parameters:
        browser - The browser generating the event.(browser-生成事件的浏览器。)
        event - A mouse event like MouseEvent.MOUSE_MOVED.(event-类似 MOUSE_MOVED 的鼠标事件。)
        screenX - The absolute X position on the screen.(screenX-屏幕上X坐标的绝对值。)
        screenY - The absolute Y position on the screen.(screenY-屏幕上X坐标的绝对值。)
        modifier - The modifier keys down during event (e.g. Shift, Ctrl).(modifier-在事件期间（例如Shift、Ctrl），修改器向下键。)
        button - An integer indicating which mouse button state changed. If parameter event is set to MouseEvent.MOUSE_WHEEL, the value of this parameter specifies the rotation indicator (negative value for left scroll and positive value for right scroll).(button-一个整数，表示鼠标按钮状态已更改。如果参数事件设置为MouseEvent.MOUSE_EWHEEL，则此参数的值指定旋转指示器（左滚动为负值，右滚动为正值）。)
